interface.name: RemoteHost
interface.javadoc:
Remote Interface for discovering and attaching to remote monitorable Java Virtual Machines.
Brian Doherty
1.5

Remote method to attach to a remote HotSpot Java Virtual Machine identified by vmid. vmid The identifier for the target virtual machine. RemoteVm - A remote object for accessing the remote Java Virtual Machine. MonitorException Thrown when any other error is encountered while communicating with the target virtual machine. RemoteException

Remote method to detach from a remote HotSpot Java Virtual Machine identified by vmid. rvm The remote object for the target Java Virtual Machine. MonitorException Thrown when any other error is encountered while communicating with the target virtual machine. RemoteException

Get a list of Local Virtual Machine Identifiers for the active Java Virtual Machine the remote system. A Local Virtual Machine Identifier is also known as an lvmid. int[] - A array of lvmids. MonitorException Thrown when any other error is encountered while communicating with the target virtual machine. RemoteException
